    • Constructor Detail

      • Port0Handler

        public Port0Handler(TNode parent,
            org.xlattice.Peer[] neighbors,
            org.xlattice.transport.IPAddress[] addrs,
            int d,
            int j,
            int z)
        Parameters:
        neighbors - initial list of Peers
        addrs - UDP addresses of those Peers, in same order
        d - fundamental time base in ms
        j - period between pings, J * D ms
        z - maximum number of pings (if <= 0, infinite)

      • setPacketPort

        public void setPacketPort(org.xlattice.transport.SchPacketPort spp,
                 java.nio.ByteBuffer buffer)
        Tells the listener what PacketPort it is listening to and what input buffer it should use. The listener can get the IOScheduler and SelectionKey from the SchPacketPort, but should not need to. Called by SchPacketPort.setKey().
        Specified by:
        setPacketPort in interface org.xlattice.transport.PacketPortListener

      • dataSent

        public void dataSent()
        Used by the PacketPort to report that transmission of an item has been completed. The address of the recipient is in SchUdpPort.addressee.
        Specified by:
        dataSent in interface org.xlattice.transport.PacketPortListener

      • dataReceived

        public void dataReceived()
        Used by SchUdpPort to report that some data has been received and is in the input buffer. The address of the sender is in the variable SchUdpPort.sender.
        Specified by:
        dataReceived in interface org.xlattice.transport.PacketPortListener

      • reportException

        public void reportException(java.lang.Exception exc)
